text: Hagi Hadadezerima eme azama hu'za ha'ma hu'naza kini vahe'mo'zama kazageno, Israeli sondia vahe'mo'zama ha'ma huzmageterage'za, ana kini vahe'mo'za hara erifru hu'za Israeli vahe'mokizmi zamagorga mani'naze. Ana hazageno Aramu vahe'mo'za Amoni vahe'ma zamaza hu'za ha'ma huzankura koro hu'naze.
